se.kth.ict.docaid.algorithms.keywords

Class Keyword

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.kth.ict.docaid.algorithms.keywords.Keyword
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Keyword>

    public class Keyword
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Keyword>
    Keyword holder, composed by a unique stem, its frequency, and a set of found corresponding terms for this stem.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.Integer frequency
      The frequency of the stem.
      private java.lang.String stem
      The unique stem.
      private java.util.Set<java.lang.String> terms
      The found corresponding terms for this stem.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Keyword(java.lang.String stem)
      Unique constructor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(java.lang.String term)
      Add a found corresponding term for this stem.
      int compareTo(Keyword o)
      Used to reverse sort a list of keywords based on their frequency (from the most frequent keyword to the least frequent one).
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
      Used to keep unicity between two keywords: only their respective stems are taken into account.
      java.lang.Integer getFrequency()
      Gets the frequency of this stem.
      java.lang.String getStem()
      Gets the unique stem of this instance.
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getTerms()
      Gets the list of found corresponding terms for this stem.
      int hashCode()
      Used to keep unicity between two keywords: only their respective stems are taken into account.
      java.lang.String toString()
      User-readable representation of a keyword: "[stem] x[frequency]".

        public Keyword(java.lang.String stem)
        Unique constructor.
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(java.lang.String term)
        Add a found corresponding term for this stem. If this term has been already found, it won't be duplicated but the stem frequency will still be incremented.
        Parameters:
        term - The term to add.

      • getStem

        public java.lang.String getStem()
        Gets the unique stem of this instance.
        Returns:
        The unique stem.

      • getFrequency

        public java.lang.Integer getFrequency()
        Gets the frequency of this stem.
        Returns:
        The frequency.

      • getTerms

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getTerms()
        Gets the list of found corresponding terms for this stem.
        Returns:
        The list of found corresponding terms.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Keyword o)
        Used to reverse sort a list of keywords based on their frequency (from the most frequent keyword to the least frequent one).
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Keyword>

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Used to keep unicity between two keywords: only their respective stems are taken into account.
